motivationalContent.title: Believe in Yourself
motivationalContent.speaker: Unknown
motivationalContent.message: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think. Don't let doubt stop you from reaching your full potential.

motivationalContent.title: Stay Hungry, Stay Foolish
motivationalContent.speaker: Steve Jobs
motivationalContent.message: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma â€“ which is living with the results of other people's thinking. Stay hungry. Stay foolish.

motivationalContent.title: The Power of Yet
motivationalContent.speaker: Carol Dweck
motivationalContent.message: Every time you say 'I can't do this', add the word 'yet'. Your brain grows stronger every time you challenge yourself.

motivationalContent.title: You Were Born for More
motivationalContent.speaker: Les Brown
motivationalContent.message: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream. It's not over until you win. You have greatness within you!

motivationalContent.title: Keep Going
motivationalContent.speaker: Unknown
motivationalContent.message: On the days you feel like quitting, remember why you started. The only way to fail is to give up. Keep going, even if it's slow.

motivationalContent.title: Discipline Over Motivation
motivationalContent.speaker: Jocko Willink
motivationalContent.message: Motivation is fleeting. Discipline is what gets things done. Wake up early. Show up even when it's hard. Take ownership of your life.

motivationalContent.title: You Are the Author
motivationalContent.speaker: Unknown
motivationalContent.message: This is your life. You are the author of your story. Don't hand the pen to anyone else. Write something worth reading.
